ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.P1: Hi! I'm Johann, a passionate software developer focused on creating fluid user experiences and efficient solutions. I specialize in modern web technologies and I'm always looking for new challenges to keep learning.
ABOUT.P2: My goal is to build applications that not only work perfectly but are also intuitive and enjoyable to use.

CONTACT.TITLE: Let's Talk
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: I'm actively looking for new opportunities and would love to hear from you. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out.
